title: Seasonal ice encapsulation: the pivotal influence on microplastic transport and fate in cold regions
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00339J, Perspective
Zhikun Chen, Maria Elektorowicz, Chunjiang An, Xuelin Tian
Owing to their small size and stability, MPs have been found to be present in different media all over the world, even in the most remote regions such as the Arctic and Antarctic.
